channel.title: Timers For Magic NEED HELP! PLEASE READ!
channel.description: Im using a project czar based server the ice barrage timers won't work properly Ive tried almost everything Like Ill barrage and I can't barrage for like 7 seconds later same with blitz if anyone know I will rep please!

item.title: Timers For Magic NEED HELP! PLEASE READ!
item.dc:creator: @Reforced _Reforced
item.description:
@Reforced wrote:

[quote=“warlock 999, post:2, topic:189021”]lol, how can you rep? and btw you can get muted for saying “I will rep please!” heres my barrage code { if(playerLevel[6] >= 94) { startAnimation(1979); calculateMagicHit(30); hitDiff = MageDamage; inCombat(); PkingDelay = 15; stayStill(); if(hitDiff >= 0 && hitDiff <= 200) { stillgfx(368, absY, absX); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); } else { stillgfx(85, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); } } }[/quote]

He probably doesn’t have standStill declared since it’s project czar … all there is is PkDelay, he means against npcs.

Read full topic
item.source: Timers For Magic NEED HELP! PLEASE READ!
